n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

ans = 0

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] == x[i-1]:
        ans += 1
    elif x[i] == x[i-1] + 2:
        ans += 1
        x[i] -= 1

print(ans)

# SOLUTION
n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, n):
    ans += abs(x[i] - x[i - 1]) - 1

print(ans)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

ans = 0

    ans += x[n - i - 1] - x[i]
